UAHuntsvilleâ€™s iSystems Club is a student organization that combines strong business skills with the experience and technical abilities needed to compete in today's information-based society.

Through a combination of workshops, projects, and team-building exercises, we prepare our members to become some of the most competitive forces in the field of Information Systems.

Want to learn more? Be sure to check out our "About Us" section!
